alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 11:51AM EDT until April 01 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wayne County in northeastern Ohio... Holmes County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 1245 PM EDT. * At 1150 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Polk to near Centerburg, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Wooster, Millersburg, Orrville, Berlin, Rittman, Walnut Creek, Doylestown, Loudonville, Creston, Dalton, Shreve, West Salem, Killbuck, Holmesville, Glenmont, Mount Eaton, Nashville, Winesburg, Farmerstown and Smithville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Strong wind gusts in excess of 50 mph will continue even after the rain exits.
